Marielle.name: Marielle
Marielle.description:
<c=ac507e>Marielle</c>
A zealot of the occult. She uses her cards to <c=pink>fry her enemies</c> and <c=red>delay the inevitable</c>.

Repentance.name: REPENTANCE
Repentance.description: At the start of combat, gain an <c=card>Absolve</c>.

DarkAura.name: DARK AURA
DarkAura.description: At the start of combat, apply 1 <c=status>CURSE</c> to the enemy and yourself.

HotPotato.name: HOT POTATO
HotPotato.description: When gaining any amount of heat, apply 1 <c=status>HEAT</c> to the enemy.

RedCandle.name: RED CANDLE
RedCandle.description: Overheat on the enemy triggers instantly, instead of at the end of the turn.

TollingBell.name: TOLLING BELL
TollingBell.description: While overheating, add 1 damage to all attacks for each <c=status>CURSE</c> you have.

NoMercy.name: NO MERCY
NoMercy.description: At the start of combat, apply 30 <c=status>CURSE</c> to the enemy.

Curse.name: Curse
Curse.description: Increase the damage and threshold of overheat by <c=pink>{0}</c>.

Fleeting.name: Fleeting
Fleeting.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, it is exhausted.
